sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"
import {Form, Row, Col, InputGroup} from "react-bootstrap"
import {roomName, roomType, validation} from "../Utils/validation"

function CreateRoom(){

    const [roomDetails, setRoomDetails] = useState({ 
        roomName,
        roomType
        })


    return<>
    
        <Row className="justify-content-center mt-5 login-form">
            <Col className="input-create-room" xs={11} md={5} lg={3}>
                <Form.Group>
                    <Form.Control id="roomName" type="text" name="roomName" isInvalid={roomDetails["roomName"].inValid} placeholder="Room Name"
                    onBlur={(e)=>{setRoomDetails(validation(e.target, roomDetails))}}/>
                    {roomDetails["roomName"].errors.map((value,index)=>
                    {return <Form.Control.Feedback className="feedback" key={index} type="invalid"> {value} </Form.Control.Feedback>})}
                </Form.Group>
            </Col>

            <Col className="input-create-room" xs={11} md={5} lg={3}>
                <InputGroup>
                    <Form.Select 
                        aria-label="Default select example"
                        name="roomType" 
                        isInvalid = {roomDetails["roomType"].inValid}
                        onChange={(e)=>setRoomDetails(validation(e.target, roomDetails))}>
                        <option value="">Type Room</option>
                        <option value="public">public</option>
                        <option value="private">private</option>
                    </Form.Select>
                    {roomDetails["roomType"].errors.map((value,index)=>
                    {return <Form.Control.Feedback className="feedback" key={index} type="invalid"> {value} </Form.Control.Feedback>})}
                </InputGroup>
            </Col>

        </Row>

    </>
}

export default CreateRoom
